> 4th attack = resurrect character / reincarinate character

One question. How exactly would Reincarnate Character work? I see 
little difference between that and Ressurect.

Possible prommotion from Thief might be an Assassin...

Assassin
Normal attack: throw-dagger, like thief
1st special: Cloak/Great Cloak [Great Cloak makes all onscreen allies 
invisible, including the user]
2nd special: Cluster Bomb [self explanatory]/Mega Bomb [a lot more 
power than the standard bomb]
3rd special: Steal equipment [disarms enemy and increases score]
4th special: Backstab [Either the fabled Insta-Death or a very large 
amount of damage, BUT it only works at hand-to-hand range (i.e. next 
to the poor sod it kills)]

NB: format of special attacks is Normal [explanation]/Shifter 
[explanation]. For example, Cloak/Drop Bomb means the move pulled off 
normally is Cloak, but when shifted it becomes Drop Bomb.
